df['Rural'] = df.Population - df.Urban
df['RuralPerc'] = (((df.Population-df.Urban)/df.Population)*100)
df['RuralPerc'] = df.RuralPerc.apply(lambda x: int(x))

plt.figure(figsize=(10,7))

plt.legend()
plt.show()

source.8aa26b71: We have Seen that Population of World Increased Immensly from 1950 to 2020, but the Growth Percentage every Year Decreased, this may be due to compounding effect, before 1990 the Growth is Higher but after 1990 growth start declining till 2020.
